dasatha wisiri sitina golf kridaka kridikawanta pramithiyen yuthu itha usas mattame golf krida pitiyaka tharaga kirime awasthawa udakala guwan hamudapathi abhiyogatha kusalana wiwrutha golf shurathawaliye pirimi tharaga anshaye jaya athkara ganimata guwan hamudawe sachith madhusankha samathwu athara kantha tharaga anshaye jaya himikara ganimata shirani bufin samathwuwaya.shri lanka guwan hamudawata ayath chinawaraye eegals golf links krida pitiye pasugiyada pawathi me shurathawaliyata kridaka kridikawan 83denaku sahabhagi wuha.guwan hamudapathi eyar mashal harsha abewikrama mahathage pradhanathwayen thyaga bedadima sidukerunu athara eeta guwan hamuda mandalika pradhani eyar wayis mashal kolitha gunathilaka, dantha waidya sewa adhyaksha eyar wayis mashal ee.em.bi.amunugama, guwan yana injineru adhyaksha eyar wayis mashal jayanath kumarasiri, widyuth ha widuli sandesha injineru adhyaksha eyar wayis mashal rohan pathirage, guwan hamuda katunayaka mulika kandawure anadena niladhari guwan komadoru es.ke.pathirana mahathwaruda me awasthawata ekwuha..

paswaru 2.45 damsabha mandapaya shasthrawedi eethalawatunu wawe gnyanathilaka nahimi, shasthrapathi waduge karunarathna mahatha, shasthrapathi rathna shri bandara mahatha, 3.45 bhawanawa panditha ipalawa pemananda himi, 4.45 bodhi pujawa panditha ankumbaure rewatha himi, pa.wa. 5.45 silpawaranaya.perawaru 6.00 – 6.30 silasamadana ha udasana buddha pujawa shasthrawedi randiligama mahinda himi, 8.00 – 9.00 bhawanawa mahacharya kollupitiye mahinda sangharakkhitha nahimi, 9.00 – 10.00 dharmadeshanawa habarakada shri indarathana nahimi, 10.00 – 11.00 dhammapadayen bindak lunugamwehere narada himi, 11.00 – 11.30 diwa buddhapujawa godapola nanda himi, paswaru 12.15- 2.00 sila bhawana samithiya, 2.00 – 3.00 waidya widya deshanaya chinthana galahitiyawa mahatha, 3.00 – 4.00 dharmadeshanawa shasthrapathi madowita wajirabuddhi himi, 4.00 – 5.00 wishesha deshanaya anagarika dharmasekarathuma, 5.00 – 6.00 bhawanawa kollupitiye mahinda sangharakkhitha na himi, 6.00 – 7.00 gilanpasa buddha pujawa dematapitiye madhurawansa himi, 7.00 – 8.00 dharmadeshanawa shasthrapathi kahatawilawaththe palitha nahimi.perawaru 6.00 sil samadan karawima ha theruwan wandanawa, 7.00 buddha pujawa pawathwima, 8.30 dharmadeshanawa aacharya iththapana dhammalankara anunahimi, 10.00 bhawanawa thalawegama saddhathilaka himi, pe.wa. 11.00 buddha pujawa pawathwima, paswaru 1.30 jathaka dharma deshanawa karagahawala chandananda himi, 3.00 dharma sakachchawa mahacharya bellanwila wimalarathana anunahimi, mahacharya ji.

me tharagawaliyata nokadawa paswani waratath 'prima sanrayis bred' anugrahakathwaya labi atha.labana wasare di prima samagame anugrahayen pradeshiya kanishta golf tharagawaliyak da pawathwimata niyamitha bawa kanishta golf tharagawaliya sambandhawa kolambaa rajakiya golf krida samajaye pasugiyada pawathi madhya hamuwe di tharagawaliya meheyawanu labana shri lanka golf sangamaye sabhapathi aana punchihewa mahatha sandahan kaleya.prima samuha wyaparaye silon agro indastriyal aayathanaye samanyadhikari shun tin shin, ema aayathanaye wyapara ha alewi jyeshta kalamanakaru sajith gunarathna, wiktoriya golf krida samajaye samanyadhikari eral jonstan, nuwaraeliya golf krida samajaye sabhapathi warnan thisera, kolambaa rajakiya golf krida samajaye upa sabhapathi nimal piyarathna mahathwaru da madhya hamuwata ekwuha..
